name: Sphinx heroku deploy
description: Build sphinx document on heroku and hosting its generated html files.

BASIC_AUTH.description: username:password for basic auth to access page. keep empty if auth is not needed.

GIT_URL.description: GIT URL to clone document repository. Use https://<token>@github.com/<user>/<reponame>.git schema to clone private repository.

SOURCE_PATH.description: relative path from repository root to sphinx conf.py directory. root directory is . (dot)
